message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL 

The paper discusses the ability of neural networks to learn tasks sequentially, which is a common topic in the field of machine learning. The paper proposes a method to overcome catastrophic forgetting, which is a well-known problem in neural networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.CV (Computer Vision), and cs.CL (Computation and Language).
